Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28835 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.8.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28835 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.8.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnutls is earlier than 3.8.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-28835
